Package interbase.interclient.utils

Provides a set of utilities for InterClient.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CommDiag A communication diagnostics utility for verifying basic installation and connectivity of InterClient.
Resources Default resource bundle for hardwired text and GUI labels within the InterClient utilities package.
Resources_ru Russian resource bundle for InterClient utilities.
 

Package interbase.interclient.utils Description

Provides a set of utilities for InterClient. The current set of utilities includes CommDiag, a communications diagnostics utility.
